body:
# Accident Investigation Report 28/2011

  
Report on the investigation of the catastrophic failure of a capacitor in the aft harmonic filter room on boardRMS Queen Mary 2 while approaching Barcelona, on 23 September 2010. Report No 28/2011. Published 22 December 2011.

  
[ASSET_TAG](#ASSET0) (4,491.12 kb) 

[ASSET_TAG](#ASSET1) (5,366.76 kb)

A Safety Flyer was also produced for this incident and can be viewed on our website:  
[Safety Flyer](http://maib.gov.uk/publications/accident_flyers/accident_flyers_2011/rms_qm2.cfm)
